name: Amazin Escape
description:
Amazin Escape

An infinite platformer with a lamp jumping its way out of a dark warehouse. Security drones and flying pallets are going to mess with you. And double jump bonuses and trampolines will save you in dare situations.

*       *       *

Controls:

  • Mouse - Turn
  • W - Jump Forward
  • Space - Double Jump when available

Or if you own an XBox Controller:

  • Left Stick - Turn
  • A - Double Jump

#arcade #platformer #infinite #endless
